string.value: You eliminated 30 #o5200000#s, returned to #b#p2012012##k, and received a #t4031577#. It doesn't look all the specialâ€¦ Why is the queen being so picky? Anyway, you should deliver this #t4031577# to #bthe queen #p2101007##k.
As expected, the queen didn't even say thanks. You can understand why the people of #m260000000# hate her guts. Arrrgh!
Now that you've taken care of the #o5200000#s, I'll give you a #t4031577#. It's a precious, rare item, so handle it with care.
A fairy called #p2101007# living in #m200000000# is the one who requested this? Odd. I know almost every fairy around, but I've never heard of her before.
You need some time before returning to #m260000000#. I'll hold on to the #t4031577# for now, then...
Did you bring the #t4031577#? Ho, this is a #t4031577#, indeed. The scent of this leaf is amazing compared to #t4000331#. This should be sufficient.
Not bad for a commoner. That's not saying much, since you're not a fairy, after all...
You haven't returned to #b#m260000000##k? Isn't #b#p2101007##k waiting for you?
What? You still haven't gotten me a #b#t4031577##k yet? I knew it... Commoners are incompetent.

You lost the #t4031577# after all my warnings? I shouldn't give you this for free, but since there's a fairy waiting for it, I'll give you another one. Just this once. Please take this and return to #m260000000#.
